intro: Psychotria peckoltiana, commonly known as the yellow psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and clusters of small, yellowish-white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in cloud forests. The plant contains various alkaloids, which have been of interest in botanical and pharmacological research.
